parameters.name: ClusterResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the hybrid cloud cluster.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

**

**You can call the **DescribeInstanceInfo[ operation to obtain the ID of the WAF instance.](~~140857~~)

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: RuleStatus
parameters.description:
The status of manual bypass. Valid values:

*   **on**: enabled.
*   **off**: disabled. This is the default value.
